entry.title: New release for Sengi: Sengi 1.3.0
entry.content:
Added

  • Authentication on custom emoji fetch (needed on some instances)
  • CMD+Enter hotkey to validate a new post on MacOS
  • Unmute + Unblock functionalities on profile view (and various fixes)

Changed

  • Better errors messages

Removed

  • Electron code and build logic

Fixed

  • WS notifications on Mastodon v4
  • Update all attachments before posting a new post (edge cases fixes)
  • Editing a post will now reload attachments and update them accordingly

entry.title: New release for Sengi: Sengi 1.4.0
entry.content:
Added

  • New timeline mode: Title - Account Icon - Username - Domain Name (thx @HamzaFarooqArif )

Changed

  • Delete to Remove label to remove an account from Sengi

entry.title: New release for Sengi: Sengi 1.5.0
entry.content:
Added

  • Language support
  • Translation support
  • Spellchecker synchronization with sengi-electron (needs 1.7.0 or newer)
  • Bookmark support for Pleroma, Akkoma and Takahe
  • Notification when a boosted post gets edited

Changed

  • Better UI for the dropdown menu
  • Better positioning of the follow hashtag button
  • Search panel will now focus the search input on opening
  • Esc key will now unfocus search input and post editor input
  • Expand instead of Hide in the CW politics in settings

Fixed

  • Space rendering and indentation in some use-cases
  • Post edition containing a poll will now keep the poll

entry.title: New release for Sengi: Sengi 1.6.0
entry.content:
Added

  • Language autodetection with sengi-electron (needs 1.8.0 or newer)
  • Option to enable ALT label on image having alt text
  • Option to stop animated avatar
  • Hide boosts / Block domain on user profile
  • Same instance multi-account FAQ
  • Accounts reorganization via the option / drag&drop

Changed

  • Display years when post older than 360 days
  • Always show CW text

Fixed

  • Poll initialization in post editor

entry.title: New release for Sengi: Sengi 1.7.0
entry.content:
Added

  • Support for server filters (from MastodonUI)
  • GoToSocial max char detection
  • Links in profile's image gallery to open original related post

Changed

  • Better UI structure for navigation buttons (more clickable surface)
  • Better follow/unfollow workflow with progression animation

Fixed

  • No longer adds "undefined" description on images
  • Weird polls counts in Pleroma
  • Retrieve back mention's full handle on post edition
  • Error spamming in the notification column in some edge cases

If you want to support development, consider becoming a Patreon!
